divs: sighting detailsi was filming the sky (as john bro did)to capture ufos in my video cam. after filming, i scanned the scenes frame by frame, and spotted many interesting and unusal lights and shapes. attached is one of those events filmed. i converted mpeg file into gif to show slow motions of the object. the length of this video clip is about 1\3 of a second.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Seoul
There were no other sightings in Seoul on or around May 17th 2004

Summary: UFO in transformation in the air
